name: PhotoWorlds
description:
PhotoWorlds is a puzzle game in which the player will solve puzzles using a camera. The player will photograph and area to find clues hidden in the Photo World (White blocks become green, hidden passages are revealed, etc). I had some time constraints so I do not feel I will be quite where I want the game to be, but I am happy with what I have so far and will be continuing development after the competition!

This is mainly just a tech demo in it's current form. I will be working on actual gameplay.
